Summary: Fireball/object in sky with erratic flight path moving quickly and disappearing suddenly.
divs: sighting detailswe were out for a drive returning home when we noticed a bizarre object in the sky. followed it for about 5 minutes in car before it disappeared suddenly. drove to the end of the road where there are fields that continue north and offer a wide view the sky. noticed other neighbours out of home also watching horizon. object resembled a fireball racing across the sky. it was moving too rapidly to be a meteor and too erratically to be an aircraft. airport in area, but did not resemble any helicopters\planes. no power plants or government installations in region. object was large enough to be seen from several miles away towards the north of lindsay. it was orange-red in colour. object was flying below the cloud cover, but significantly higher than trees.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lindsay
There were no other sightings in Lindsay on or around June 16th 2012
